rule.info: Office 365: $(office365.Workload) $(office365.Operation)运行。
rule.description: Office 365: $(office365.Workload) $(office365.Operation) operation.

rule.info: Office 365: $(office365.Workload) $(office365.Operation)运行。
rule.description: Office 365: $(office365.Workload) $(office365.Operation) operation.

rule.info: Office 365: 来自Exchange 管理员审核日志中的事件。
rule.description: Office 365: Events from the Exchange admin audit log.

rule.info: Office 365: Exchange 邮箱审核日志中针对单个项目执行的操作的事件，例如创建或接收电子邮件。
rule.description: Office 365: Events from an Exchange mailbox audit log for actions that are performed on a single item, such as creating or receiving an email message.

rule.info: Office 365：来自 Exchange 邮箱审核日志的事件，用于可对多个项目执行的操作，例如移动或删除一封或多封电子邮件。
rule.description: Office 365: Events from an Exchange mailbox audit log for actions that can be performed on multiple items, such as moving or deleted one or more email messages.

rule.info: Office 365：SharePoint 事件。
rule.description: Office 365: SharePoint events.

rule.description: Office 365: OneDrive for Business events.

rule.info: Office 365: Azure Active Directory 事件。
rule.description: Office 365: Azure Active Directory events.

rule.description: Office 365: Data Center security cmdlet events.

rule.info: Office 365：SharePoint 和 OneDrive for Business 中的数据丢失保护 (DLP) 事件。

rule.info: Office 365：通过统一 DLP 策略配置时，Exchange 中的数据丢失保护 (DLP) 事件。不支持基于 Exchange 传输规则的 DLP 事件。
rule.description: Office 365: Data loss protection (DLP) events in Exchange, when configured via Unified DLP Policy. DLP events based on Exchange Transport Rules are not supported.

rule.info: Office 365：SharePoint 共享事件。
